{
  "agent": "compliance-officer",
  "atomicity": {
    "is_atomic": false,
    "reasons": [
      "Feature spans multiple domains: project management (lesson planning), development (code implementation), documentation (learning materials)",
      "Involves 10+ distinct lessons requiring different technical implementations",
      "Crosses multiple components: lesson files, example code, documentation, testing infrastructure",
      "Requires coordination between learning content creation, code development, and validation",
      "Each lesson is independently atomic but collectively represents a complex multi-phase learning journey"
